name: Business Woman Magazine
goal: The goal of the Magazine is to inform the public on European integration of Ukraine and raise awareness about the role of Europe for Ukraine and vice versa, and all that through empowering women on the social, political and business levels. Our audience also receives the insight of the process of the implementation of the Association Agreement. They get the info on the vision of the European politicians about the cooperation between Ukraine and Europe
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Education, Information Society, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Employment, social affairs and inclusion
- Gender balance in decision-making positions
- Equal economic independence
- Visa policy
- Immigration and Integration
- Consultation on the European Union's (EU) legislation on the legal migration of non-EU citizens (Fitness Check on EU legal migration legislation)
